toolbar.title: Hedge
toolbar.errorMessage: Unable to log out. Please try again later.

requestHelp.greeting: Hello, how can we assist you?
requestHelp.instruction: Select how you would like to receive help from our Customer Service Representatives

helpTicket.title: Submit a Support Ticket
helpTicket.description: We will respond as soon as possible

description.descriptionOne: Register your medications and set the schedule for each dose.
description.descriptionTwo: Receive automatic alerts and track treatment progress.
description.descriptionThree: See how much time is left for the next dose and how much has been completed.
description.descriptionFour: All in one place, simple and easy to use.

gridPro.title: Custom treatment records
gridPro.descriptionOne: Choose the medication you are using and set the interval between doses and the treatment duration.
gridPro.descriptionTwo: With just a few clicks, you create a personalized schedule for each medication.
gridPro.descriptionThree: Ideal for patients in continuous or temporary treatments.

fxMarket.title: Real-time tracking
fxMarket.descriptionOne: After registering your medications, track the remaining time for the next dose.
fxMarket.descriptionTwo: See how many % of the treatment has been completed.
fxMarket.descriptionThree: Receive visual reminders and optimize your treatment adherence.
fxMarket.descriptionFour: More autonomy for you or for those you care for.
fxMarket.descriptionFive: Also ideal for caregivers and healthcare professionals.

algorithmic.title: Modern and secure solution
algorithmic.descriptionOne: No more loose notes or confusing alarms:
algorithmic.descriptionTwo: our platform gathers all treatment data in one place.
algorithmic.descriptionThree: With an intuitive and responsive design, it adapts to your daily life.
algorithmic.descriptionFive: your health deserves the best technology.

description.descriptionOne: This is a secure authentication service from Tech Pharmacy
description.descriptionTwo: that allows access to Tech Pharmacy services

notFound.title: 404 Page Not Found
notFound.descriptionOne: It seems you found a page that doesn't exist on Tech Pharmacy.
notFound.descriptionTwo: This can happen when you follow a link to something that has been deleted.
notFound.descriptionThree: Or the link was incorrect from the start.
